forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 39F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low 1C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 34F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will give way to showers of rain and wet snow during the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of precip 80%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will give way to lingering snow showers during the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 32F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow during the afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will mix with rain at times during the afternoon. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with periods of snow after midnight. Low around 0C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with periods of snow after midnight. Low 33F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will give way to lingering snow showers during the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will taper off as a few snow showers during the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low near 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low near 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low -6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 22F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered snow showers during the morning. Then partly to mostly cloudy for the afternoon. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few snow showers scattered about the area in the morning, otherwise a good deal of clouds. High 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with a few snow showers in the evening. Low -6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with snow showers during the evening. Low 21F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 29F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low -7C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 21F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High -1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 31F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low near 25F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.
